content: As an owner/admin you can view and manage all API keys in this {{productName}}.

comment.text: This translation key is used for describing API keys management features within a portal settings page. It will be displayed to owners/admins as a tooltip or description in the UI. The context suggests it appears on a page related to developer tools and settings.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation includes quotation marks around "API". While technically correct, it's stylistically better to avoid them in this context unless specifically required by a brand guideline.  It disrupts the flow of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: بصفتكم مالكًا أو مسؤولًا، يمكنكم عرض جميع مفاتيح API وإدارتها في {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The curly braces `{{productName}}` are present in the Azerbaijani translation, mirroring the English. It's important to confirm whether this placeholder should remain as is or be replaced with the actual product name during implementation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Confirm if `{{productName}}` should be replaced with the actual product name or if it should remain as a placeholder.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Unnecessary colon after 'ssa'. It breaks the sentence flow and is grammatically incorrect in Finnish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Omistajana/pääkäyttäjänä voit katsella ja hallita kaikkia API-avaimia tässä {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation uses a hyphen (-) instead of a more appropriate connector like 'և' (and) when joining 'դիտել' (view) and 'կառավարել' (manage).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change 'դիտել և կառավարել' to 'դիտել կառավարել' or 'դիտել և կառավարել'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation maintains the English "{{productName}}" placeholder, which is appropriate for consistency.
The term 'API 키 소유자/관리자' is a literal translation of 'owner/admin' and is not the most natural or idiomatic way to express this in Korean. It's overly verbose and slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: API 키를 사용하는 관리자 (API key users/administrators) or API 키 관리를 담당하는 관리자 (administrators responsible for API key management)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation retains the {{productName}} placeholder, which should ideally be replaced with the localized product name or removed if it's not needed in the Lao context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace {{productName}} with the localized product name or remove if not applicable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Portuguese translation uses the formal 'pode' (you can) instead of the more common and generally preferred informal 'você pode' when addressing users. While 'pode' isn't technically incorrect, it creates a more distant and less approachable tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Como proprietário/administrador, você pode ver e gerir todas as chaves API neste {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation uses 'ඔබ හිමිකරුවකු/පරිපාලකයකු ලෙස' which is a bit formal.  Consider a more conversational alternative for better user experience.
The phrase 'මෙම {{productName}} හි සියලු API යතුරු' can be improved for better flow. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward.

The Serbian translation includes the phrase 'у оквиру' which translates to 'within' or 'in the scope of'. While not incorrect, it adds unnecessary words and feels less natural than a simpler phrasing. It's often better to omit phrases like this for clarity and conciseness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Као власник/администратор можете прегледати и управљати свим API кључевима у {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation retains the {{productName}} placeholder, which should be consistent with the English version. Ensure this placeholder is handled correctly during implementation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify that {{productName}} is correctly replaced with the actual product name in the Turkish implementation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'та керувати ними' translates to 'and manage them' but a more natural Ukrainian phrasing would be something like 'та ними керувати' or simply 'та керувати'.  'Та керувати' is slightly more concise and reads more smoothly in Ukrainian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Як власник/адміністратор ви можете переглядати всі ключі API в цьому {{productName}} та ними керувати.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'API 密钥' is a direct transliteration of 'API keys'. A more natural Chinese translation might be 'API 接口密钥' or 'API 访问密钥', depending on the precise meaning intended. 'API 密钥' is understandable but less idiomatic.
